DOC.detailed_description: In clinical trial , 61 patient require endodontic retreatments posterior teeth select . A single visit Endodontic retreatment do . After biomechanical preparation , Low Level Laser irradiate buccal lingual mucosa overlie apex target tooth experimental group . In control group patient receive placebo laser eliminate probable psychological effect laser . Laser irradiation do single dose 808 nm wavelength ( Whitening Lase II- Laser DMC , Samsung , Korea ) 100 mw power , dose 70 J/cm2 80 second . Pain severity record treatment , immediately treatment 4 , 8 , 12 , 24 48 hour treatment visual analogue scale ( VAS ) . The pain score statistically analyze chi-square test two group . The effect different variable post-operative pain experience also study mean Logistic regression .
